DIV1.P: The table below gives a brief description of all templates included in the Text Class distribution. As a companion, you may also want to view the list of processing instructions also supported in text class.

TR.TD: Supplies the form HTML for boolean searching within contents of book bag. Works with bbagsearch.tpl; together replacing booleanbbag.tpl
Displays a form for emailing the contents of the book bag. The form contains only one input box for an email address.
Displays current contents of the book bag.
Supplies the form HTML for proximity searching within contents of book bag. Works with bbagsearch.tpl; together replacing proximitybbag.tpl
Container HTML for all forms providing searches within book bag.
Supplies the form HTML for basic searching within contents of book bag. Works with bbagsearch.tpl; together replacing simplebbag.tpl
Supplies the form HTML for bibliographic searching within [a] specified collection[s]. Works with search.tpl; together replacing bib.tpl and bibext.tpl
Supplies the form HTML for Boolean searching within [a] specified collection[s]. Works with search.tpl; together replacing boolean.tpl and booleanext.tpl
Generic browse template.
Used to display lists of collections, grouped by collection groups.
Displays bibliographic header and table of contents.
Home page template for links to home after sessions have been established.
Container for all Javascript code required for navigation menus.
Container for all navigation/header HTML, inserted in all template pages.
Informational page included in the UMDL Texts portal site.
Displays contents of a note within a designated target window.
Draws the frameset for displaying documents as page-facsimile-images.
Main frame of pageviewer.frameset containing the current page image.
Top frame of pageviewer.frameset containing site header cells
Middle frame of pageviewer.frameset, containing navigation bar and document navigation elements.

For incidences where an id reference to a document may be incomplete, producing a list of documents with ids that contain the id reference. The template generates a list of possible documents as a linked list. Replaces both pageviewer.picklist.tpl and text.picklist.tpl
Supplies the form HTML for proximity searching within [a] specified collection[s]. Works with search.tpl; together replacing proximity.tpl and proximityext.tpl
Displays results for searches against one or more collections.
Container HTML for all forms providing searches for collection[s].
Displays a search history for the current session as a table, containing, in one table, the successfully submitted queries as links for resubmission.
Supplies the form HTML for basic searching within [a] specified collection[s]. Works with search.tpl; together replacing simple.tpl and simpleext.tpl
Displays any requested portion of a fully encoded text.
Displays a warning note when the "view entire text" link is selected from a bibliographic header page.
Container HTML for the word index form after a word index has been started. References components ww-fullnewsearchform.chnk and ww-fullscrollform.chnk
Provides the form HTML for a new word wheel search option in a current word wheel form. Referenced from ww-full.tpl
Provides the HTML content for the full word wheel scroll list to ww-full.tpl
Word index initial form. displays an input box or linked index for entering a word index.
